lines.text: [last lines]
And you will face the sea of darkness, and all therein that may be explored.
[reading from the book Eibon]
Woe be unto him who opens one of the seven gateways to Hell, because through that gateway, evil will invade the world.
How long will it take?
It'll take as long as it takes.
Trust me, I'm a doctor.
You have carte blanche, but not a blank check.
Attack, Dickie!
Arthur! Where is the doctor?

[the door opens]
He is on his way...

[during the zombie rampage at the morgue]
Harris! What the hell is going on around here?
I don't know. I think I'm going crazy. Here they come!
So, what did you do in the Big Apple?
Just about everything a girl could do without losing her good English breeding and reputation. Modeling, dancing, secretary... I almost became an unsuccessful fashion designer.
Arthur! What are you doing in my room?
I was looking for keys.
*Which* keys?
I told Ma that I was gonna clean up the rooms, but some of them are locked.
Well, l just have to find those keys, Arthur, won't I? Or else we'll simply call a locksmith. In the meantime, could you go up on the roof and check the chimney? I think it is clogged.
I heard a car drive up before. Was it Joe?
Yeah. Why?
We blind see things more clearly.
No, Liza, I'm a doctor, and I won't accept irrational explanations. I want to talk to Harris. I'm gonna call the FBI.
It's Jill. She was in the autopsy theater all alone.
You ungodly warlock! Because of you this hotel and this town will be cursed forever!
Be careful what you do... because this hotel was built over one of the Seven Doors of Evil - and only I can save you!
